definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The horizontal axis was then divided into 15 spaces.
sentences.chinese: 在橫座標軸上等分成15個格。

sentences.english: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.chinese: 使用最低限度的協調與橫座標值使他們不跑在一起。

sentences.english: X is the sum of "content points".
sentences.chinese: 橫座標X軸是“內容點”的集合。

sentences.english: The experimental curve runs nearly parallel to the abscissa .
sentences.chinese: 實驗曲線幾乎與橫座標平行。
